name: LD Jam #40 - Ninjitsu Conservation
description:
You are the last remnant of the Akai clan. Invade the stronghold of the treacherous Aoi and use your shuriken to kill all their ninja. But beware, for every enemy that you kill, the others become more powerful!

Controls: Use arrow keys to move and Enter to shoot.

Music by Jay Man: http://ourmusicbox.com/
